alvaArmor.name: Alva Armor
alvaArmor.description: Alva, the seeker of the spurned, wore this armor in the past.
alvaArmor.special: Whenever wearing the Alva armor, you have disadvantage on all Wisdom saving throws.

archdeaconRobes.name: Archdeacon Robes
archdeaconRobes.description: It is said there were three Archdeacons in the Cathderal of the Deep, all considered delegates of the gods.
archdeaconRobes.special: Whenever wearing the Archdeacon Robes, you may choose to regain all casts of one miracle without Long resting. The miracle must be of a level equal to half of your character level, rounded down, to a minimum of 1st level. This ability can only be used once per Long rest.
